Read method¶

Reading a csv file into a TimeArray object is supported.

readtimearray¶

The readtimearray method is a wrapper for the Base.readcsv method that returns a TimeArray.

function readtimearray(fname::String; meta=Nothing)

The fname argument is a string that represents the location and name of the csv file that you wish to parse into a TimeArray object. Optionally, you can add a value to the meta field.

This method is currently limited in its ability to parse different representations for a timestamp value. See GitHub issue #105. If you’re bored some weekend and feel like ruining some brain cells on regex, then feel free to fix this and submit a pull request.
